description: This source file implements a real-time Server-Sent Events (SSE) client for attendance updates. It provides methods to connect to an SSE endpoint, process incoming JSON events, and handle disconnection and cleanup.

classes.name: RealtimeService
classes.description: A client class to connect to, listen to, and manage server-sent events (SSE) for real-time updates.

methods.name: RealtimeService
methods.description: Constructor initializing the SSE client with an optional HTTP client.

methods.name: events
methods.description: Getter providing a stream of JSON-decoded events received from the SSE connection.

methods.name: _isEnabled
methods.description: Private getter to check if the real-time updates are enabled based on environment variable.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to an SSE endpoint, starts listening to incoming data, and routes JSON events to the stream controller.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects from the SSE endpoint and cancels the stream subscription.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Performs cleanup by disconnecting, closing the stream controller, and closing the HTTP client.
